mapper.insert: insert into setmeal (category_id, name, price, status, description, image, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) value (#{categoryId}, #{name}, #{price}, #{status}, #{description}, #{image}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser})

insert into setmeal_dish (setmeal_id, dish_id, name, price, copies) values
(#{setmealDish.setmealId}, #{setmealDish.dishId}, #{setmealDish.name}, #{setmealDish.price}, #{setmealDish.copies})
mapper.select: select * from setmeal order by update_time desc

select s.id as id, s.category_id as categoryId, s.name as name, s.price as price, s.status as status, s.description as description, s.image as image, s.update_time as updateTime, c.name as categoryName, sd.setmeal_id as setmealId, sd.dish_id as dishId, sd.name as setmeal_dish_name, sd.price as setmeal_dish_price, sd.copies as copies from setmeal as s left join setmeal_dish as sd on s.id = sd.setmeal_id left join category as c on s.category_id = c.id where s.id = #{id}
